long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TailType: Refine Your Online Writing Instantly

TailType is a Chrome extension that uses OpenAI's ChatGPT technology to help you write better online. With TailType, you can:

✓ Correct spelling and grammar errors
✓ Change the style of your text
✓ Improve the overall quality of your text
✓ Adjust the length of your text
✓ Translate your text into multiple languages
✓ Generate relevant hashtags
✓ Explain complex text
✓ Paraphrase your text
✓ Formulate responses

TailType is easy to use. Just install the extension and click on the TailType icon in any text field. You'll then be able to use the powerful prompts to enhance your writing.

TailType is free to use with 30 prompts per day. Upgrade to Pro for USD 10 per month and get 1000 prompts per day.

Here are some of the benefits of using TailType:

Improve your writing skills: TailType can help you improve your writing skills by providing feedback on your grammar, style, and overall clarity.

Save time: TailType can save you time by automatically correcting spelling and grammar errors, and by suggesting ways to improve your writing.

Make your writing more engaging: TailType can help you make your writing more engaging by suggesting ways to change the style or tone of your writing.

Reach a wider audience: TailType can help you reach a wider audience by translating your writing into multiple languages.

Try TailType today and see how it can help you write better online!
